certifications.title: Learn How To Code: Google's Go (golang) Programming Language

projects: [{"title":"Prosthetic arm ","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"• Built and assembled a 3D printed prosthetic arm capable of recognizing and imitating hand gestures, using Ultimaker Cura.• Successfully implemented the program that runs a real time video from webcam using OpenCV on Raspberry Pi.• Detected the fingers by computing the convex hull as well as the convexity defect regions of the hand contour."}]
